info.title: Promotion Management
info.description: Sellers can set regular or promotional prices for their items. Setting the Promotional prices is an option to create unique pricing for events such as clearance sales or to call out a comparison price

put.description: Sellers can update or delete an existing promotion price as well as set up a new promotional price.

0.name: promo
0.description: The promotional price. Set to 'true' in order to retrieve promotional prices

5.name: WM_SEC.AUTH_SIGNATURE
5.description: The vendor's digital signature, generated by running the JAR file or custom generation code

6.name: WM_CONSUMER.ID
6.description: A unique ID required to access the API
6.example: Get the Consumer ID from Developer Center after logging in

Update Promotion.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<Price xmlns="http://walmart.com/">
    <itemIdentifier>
        <sku>promoSync3</sku>
    </itemIdentifier>
    <pricingList>
        <pricing effectiveDate="2016-09-09T21:29:39.420Z" expirationDate="2016-09-10T21:29:39.420Z" processMode="UPSERT">
            <currentPrice>
                <value amount="35.00"/>
            </currentPrice>
            <currentPriceType>REDUCED</currentPriceType>
            <comparisonPrice>
                <value amount="97.00"/>
            </comparisonPrice>
        </pricing>
        <pricing effectiveDate="2016-09-11T21:29:39.420Z" expirationDate="2016-09-12T21:29:39.420Z" processMode="UPSERT">
            <currentPrice>
                <value amount="44.00"/>
            </currentPrice>
        </pricing>
    </pricingList>
</Price>

Delete Promotion.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<Price xmlns="http://walmart.com/">
    <itemIdentifier>
        <sku>promoSync3</sku>
    </itemIdentifier>
    <pricingList>
        <pricing effectiveDate="2016-09-09T21:29:39.420Z" expirationDate="2016-09-10T21:29:39.420Z" processMode="DELETE">
            <currentPrice>
                <value amount="35.00"/>
            </currentPrice>
            <currentPriceType>REDUCED</currentPriceType>
            <comparisonPrice>
                <value amount="97.00"/>
            </comparisonPrice>
        </pricing>
        <pricing effectiveDate="2016-09-11T21:29:39.420Z" expirationDate="2016-09-12T21:29:39.420Z" processMode="DELETE">
            <currentPrice>
                <value amount="44.00"/>
            </currentPrice>
        </pricing>
    </pricingList>
</Price>

application\/xml.example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<ns2:ItemPriceResponse xmlns:ns2="http://walmart.com/">
    <ns2:mart>1</ns2:mart>
    <ns2:sku>16246494</ns2:sku>
    <ns2:message>Thank you. Your price has been updated. Please allow up to five minutes for this change to be reflected on the site.</ns2:message>
</ns2:ItemPriceResponse>

post.description: Updates or creates promotional prices for multiple specified SKUs

5.name: WM_SEC.AUTH_SIGNATURE
5.description: The vendor's digital signature, generated by running the JAR file or custom generation code

6.name: WM_CONSUMER.ID
6.description: A unique ID required to access the API
6.example: Get the Consumer ID from Developer Center after logging in

Update Promotions.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<PriceFeed xmlns="http://walmart.com/">
    <PriceHeader>
        <version>1.5.1</version>
        <feedDate>2019-04-05T18:46:32.483-07:00</feedDate>
    </PriceHeader>
    <Price>
        <itemIdentifier>
            <sku>10891635</sku>
        </itemIdentifier>
        <pricingList replaceAll="true">
            <pricing effectiveDate="2019-04-05T18:42:00.943Z" expirationDate="2019-04-05T18:59:59.943Z" processMode="UPSERT">
                <currentPrice>
                    <value currency="CAD" amount="62.32"/>
                </currentPrice>
                <currentPriceType>CLEARANCE</currentPriceType>
                <comparisonPrice>
                    <value currency="CAD" amount="63.32"/>
                </comparisonPrice>
            </pricing>
            <pricing effectiveDate="2019-04-05T19:05:00.943Z" expirationDate="2019-04-05T19:30:59.943Z" processMode="UPSERT">
                <currentPrice>
                    <value currency="CAD" amount="60.00"/>
                </currentPrice>
                <currentPriceType>REDUCED</currentPriceType>
                <comparisonPrice>
                    <value currency="CAD" amount="63.32"/>
                </comparisonPrice>
            </pricing>
        </pricingList>
    </Price>
</PriceFeed>

Delete Promotions.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<PriceFeed xmlns="http://walmart.com/">
    <PriceHeader>
        <version>1.5.1</version>
        <feedDate>2016-04-18T11:46:32.483-07:00</feedDate>
    </PriceHeader>
    <Price>
        <itemIdentifier>
            <sku>MD-12345678</sku>
        </itemIdentifier>
        <pricingList replaceAll='false'>
            <pricing effectiveDate="2016-11-03T09:49:57.943Z" expirationDate="2016-11-04T09:49:57.943Z" processMode="DELETE">
                <currentPrice>
                    <value amount="44.00"/>
                </currentPrice>
                <currentPriceType>CLEARANCE</currentPriceType>
                <comparisonPrice>
                    <value amount="62.00"/>
                </comparisonPrice>
            </pricing>
            <pricing effectiveDate="2016-11-07T16:02:58.762Z" expirationDate="2016-11-08T16:02:58.762Z" processMode="DELETE">
                <currentPrice>
                    <value amount="32.00"/>
                </currentPrice>
                <currentPriceType>REDUCED</currentPriceType>
                <comparisonPrice>
                    <value amount="55.00"/>
                </comparisonPrice>
            </pricing>
        </pricingList>
    </Price>
</PriceFeed>

feedId.description: A unique ID, returned from the Bulk Upload API, used for tracking the feed file

get.summary: Get list of promotional prices for a SKU
get.description: Retrieves a list of promotional prices for a single SKU.

5.name: WM_SEC.AUTH_SIGNATURE
5.description: The vendor's digital signature, generated by running the JAR file or custom generation code

6.name: WM_CONSUMER.ID
6.description: A unique ID required to access the API
6.example: Get the Consumer ID from Developer Center after logging in

application\/xml.example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<ServiceResponse xmlns:ns2="http://walmart.com/">
    <status>OK</status>
    <errors/>
    <header>
        <headerAttributes/>
    </header>
    <payload xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="ns2:itemPriceType">
        <ns2:itemIdentifier>
            <ns2:sku>WGU-002 Standalone</ns2:sku>
        </ns2:itemIdentifier>
        <ns2:pricingList>
            <ns2:pricing effectiveDate="2016-09-04T01:26:44.296Z" expirationDate="2016-09-05T01:26:44.296Z" promoId="889b4d96-2e00-4a4a-8152-42d101b99192">
                <ns2:currentPrice>
                    <ns2:value amount="24"></ns2:value>
                </ns2:currentPrice>
                <ns2:currentPriceType>CLEARANCE</ns2:currentPriceType>
                <ns2:comparisonPrice>
                    <ns2:value amount="86"></ns2:value>
                </ns2:comparisonPrice>
            </ns2:pricing>
        </ns2:pricingList>
    </payload>
</ServiceResponse>

feedId.description: A unique ID, returned from the Bulk Upload API, used for tracking the feed file

authorization.name: Authorization
authorization.description: Basic authorization header. Base 64 encodes the Client ID and Client Secret retrieved in step two of the integration steps.

accessToken.name: WM_SEC.ACCESS_TOKEN
accessToken.description: The access token retrieved in the Token API call

channelType.name: WM_CONSUMER.CHANNEL.TYPE
channelType.description: A unique ID to track the consumer request by channel. Use the Consumer Channel Type received during onboarding

correlationId.name: WM_QOS.CORRELATION_ID
correlationId.description: A unique ID which identifies each API call and used to track and debug issues; use a random generated GUID for this ID
